town_halls.title: ERA Town Hall Meeting
town_halls.summary:
*Meeting with Enabling The Future*

# ERA Town Hall Meeting

**Date:** May 08, 2024 | **Duration:** 84 mins

**Links:** [View Meeting](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=view_recording_link&utm_medium=email) | [Ask Fathom](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=ask_fathom&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=ask_fathom&utm_medium=email)

## ACTION ITEMS ✨

- [ ] [Email Hollis links to eco-restoration films/videos compilations and carbon sequestration paper](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=3772.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Post Michael Pilarski's carbon sequestration paper in Collaborative for Change article section](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=3854.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Contact Hollis McLellan to discuss interconnecting ERA and Collaborative for Change activities](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=4155.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Draft and distribute ERA fund allocation proposal for $3000 member directory development](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=4606.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Schedule regular check-in meetings with intern Ryan Farhoman](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=4931.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)


## Meeting Purpose

## Key Takeaways

- [Several new members introduced themselves and their projects, including John Goedschalk (Biotara), Noura Angulo (Biodiversity for a Livable Climate intern), and Hollis McLellan (Collaborative for Change platform)](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=104.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Datu Lanelio provided an update on his work defending indigenous lands and restoring forests in the Philippines, facing threats but making progress](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=549.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Billimarie Lubiano Robinson shared about the biodiversity increase at their Mojave Desert restoration site and need for fundraising/nonprofit guidance](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=369.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Jon Schull proposed developing a member directory for the ERA website at a cost of $3,000 to improve networking (to be voted on)](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=718.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [17-year-old Ryan Farhoumand impressed with his climate/sustainability initiatives and internship with the ERA](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=799.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


## Topics

### Introductions and Project Updates

- [John Goedschalk introduced Biotara, which partners with indigenous communities to sustainably source wild oils/ingredients while protecting forests](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=1008.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Noura Angulo is interning with Biodiversity for a Livable Climate on promoting nature-based solutions and a financial transactions tax proposal](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=224.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Hollis McLellan presented the Collaborative for Change platform to incubate new initiatives, promote literature, host webinars/podcasts](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=482.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Datu Lanelio Sangcoan Update (Philippines)

- [Leading consortium of 15 indigenous NGOs to defend rainforests against mining/logging](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=2549.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Planted 30,000 fast-growing native trees for restoring sacred landscapes](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=2724.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Facing threats as a leader but committed to enabling communities to conserve lands](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=2765.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Needs funding support; can receive US donations via Tribesfornature.org](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=2936.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Forever Star Tree (Billimarie Lubiano Robinson)

- [Seeing intense biodiversity increase at 10-acre Mojave Desert restoration site](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=277.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Hosting BioBlitz events to catalog species with community scientists](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=289.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Need board members with fundraising/nonprofit experience to access funding channels](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=4037.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Focusing on the positive impact possible through restoration work](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=4546.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Proposed Member Directory for ERA Website

- [$3,000 project to create member directory on website - internal and external views](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=4632.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Members can customize their profile information](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=4699.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Allows easier networking and information sharing among members](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=4686.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Proposal to be put to membership vote to allocate funds](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=4784.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


## Next Steps

- [Vote will be held on allocating funds for proposed ERA member directory](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=4797.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Follow up with members like Hollis McLellan and John Goedschalk on potential collaborations](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=4117.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Continue supporting Datu Lanelio's indigenous forest defense efforts in the Philippines](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=2936.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Explore compensating intern Ryan Farhoumand for his contributions to the ERA](https://fathom.video/share/fMwUiYxRm2NYUWfaJ1rdEWRwhYUy8HB2?tab=summary&timestamp=4942.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
